entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-400-UF
Model: LMR-400-UF
Type: cable
0.405" diameter ultra-flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 84.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.5 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 1.0 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 1.5 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 2.2 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 3.2 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 3.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 3.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 6.6 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.405" diameter ultra-flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Ultra-flexible version of LMR-400, slightly higher loss but much easier to route
